com.atc.simulator.flightdata.system_state_database

Interface SystemStateDatabaseListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayApplication.AircraftDatabase, PredictionEngineSystemStateDatabase, PredictionEngineThread

    public interface SystemStateDatabaseListener
    listener interface for SystemStateDatabase

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNewAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase, java.lang.String aircraftID)
      This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase creates a new aircraft.
      void onRemoveAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase, java.lang.String aircraftID)
      This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase removes an aircraft.
      void onSystemStateUpdate(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> aircraftIDs)
      This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase receives updated information.
      void onUpdateAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase, java.lang.String aircraftID)
      This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase receives an update to an aircraft.

    • Method Detail

      • onSystemStateUpdate

        void onSystemStateUpdate(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> aircraftIDs)
        This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase receives updated information.
        Parameters:
        stateDatabase - database which triggered this event
        aircraftIDs - of type ArrayList<String>

      • onNewAircraft

        void onNewAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase,
                   java.lang.String aircraftID)
        This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase creates a new aircraft.
        Parameters:
        stateDatabase - database which triggered this event
        aircraftID - of type String

      • onRemoveAircraft

        void onRemoveAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase,
                      java.lang.String aircraftID)
        This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase removes an aircraft.
        Parameters:
        stateDatabase - database which triggered this event
        aircraftID - of type String

      • onUpdateAircraft

        void onUpdateAircraft(SystemStateDatabase stateDatabase,
                      java.lang.String aircraftID)
        This method is called by the SystemStateDataBase on its listeners whenever the SystemStateDatabase receives an update to an aircraft.
        Parameters:
        stateDatabase - database which triggered this event
        aircraftID - of type String
